name: rent-management-application
description: A comprehensive platform for managing rental properties including rooms, PG (paying guest), flats and other similar properties. This application allows property owners and managers to efficiently list, track and manage rent payments, property details, tenant information and rental contracts. It aims to provide a user-friendly interface to streamline the rental process for both property owners and tenants, ensuring transparency, ease of access and timely rent collection.
author: The Kailash Parihar
